الأمم المتحدة: 120 طفلا يموتون يوميا في السودان بسبب نقص التغذية
02 Nov 2019, 04:35 by أ ش أ
أ ش أ قالت الأمم المتحدة إن عقودا من الصراع في السودان عرضت ملايين الأطفال إلى الخطر، لافتة الى أن هناك أكثر من 38% من الأطفال دون سن الخامسة مصابين بصغر الحجم (قصر القامة مقارنة بأعمارهم) ، وحوالي 17% منهم يعانون من نحول البنية (أشد نحولا مقارنة بأطوالهم)، ويموت نحو 120 طفل كل يوم بسبب نقص التغذية والأسباب ذات الصلة.وأوضحت الأمم المتحدة ، في بيان نشر اليوم الجمعة على موقعها على الانترنت بمناسبة انتهاء زيارة المديرة التنفيذية لمنظمة يونيسف هنريتا فور إلى السودان ، أن 2.6 مليون طفل في السودان يحتاجون إلى مساعدات إنسانية.وقالت المديرة التنفيذية لليونيسف إن السودان يشهد لحظة تاريخية، وإنه من الملح وضع حقوق الأطفال في صلب جدول الأعمال الوطني.وخلال زيارتها الأولى من نوعها إلى السودان، التقت مع العديد من كبار المسئولين السودانيين، بمن فيهم رئيس الوزراء عبد الله حمدوك، وتوجهت خلال الزيارة إلى كادوقلي في جنوب كردفان (جنوب السودان)، حيث التقت مع الشركاء وأطياف مختلفة من المجتمع السوداني.وأكدت هنريتا فور للمسئولين السودانيين ضرورة إعطاء أولوية لاحتياجات الأطفال ، بما في ذلك تقوية العمل ضد سوء التغذية، ومعالجة أزمة التعليم، وزيادة الاستثمارات في قطاعات الأطفال والشباب.

Representatives of the social sphere were congratulated on their professional holiday

02 Nov 2019, 03:14

At the City Palace of Arts, Vinnytsia social workers greeted them with a professional holiday
Diplomas, letters of thanks and cash prizes were handed over to the perpetrators by the head of the Vinnytsia Regional State Administration Vladislav Skalsky and Vinnytsia Mayor Sergei Morgunov.
“We are extremely pleased to welcome you today with a professional day. Not everyone will be able to choose for themselves the profession of social worker, because people come to you, each with their own problems and character, and you need to have a serious enough endurance, big heart and understanding of people. I am proud that our Vinnytsia team of social workers, and almost 500 people, is the best in Ukraine. The most important thing is that you provide quality services to Vinnytsia, you are the professionals of your business. I want people to thank you for your work, to be a cohesive and united team, not to look at everyone's place of work: whether in the structure of the Vinnytsia City Council, or in a pension fund, or at the level of the oblast or region. We should all be one team, because our task is to provide quality services to people, ”said Mayor Sergei Morgunov.
“99% come to you not with joy but with a problem. They are looking for a solution to these problems. No matter what it is - loss of health, difficult family circumstances, temporary employment problems, the needs of social or psychological adaptation of our defenders returning from the war zone, adoption assistance, targeted assistance, subsidies. This is not a complete list of the problems that people are facing. That is why today a quote from the famous Ukrainian classic Mykhailo Frank comes to mind that human life has value while you can help people. So thank you very much for all the good things you do, for the 138,000 subsidies that have been allocated in the Vinnytsia region, for the 462,000 pensioners served by the pension fund, for the tremendous work that you do for the state to do its job social function, and local self-government ensured that it should be provided to community members. And most importantly, always find the strength to meet people with a smile, ”said Vladislav Skalsky, the head of the Vinnytsia Regional State Administration, greeting the workers of social protection.
Social workers celebrate their professional day every year on the first Sunday of November. They have traditionally received greetings from city and regional authorities the day before.
During the 9 months of 2019, the City Council's Department of Social Policy received 59,000 requests, which is 16 355 less than in the corresponding period of 2018. 93% of written appeals were positive. In 2019, the territorial offices of the Vyshenka and the Old Town TSNP provided 193.4 thousand social services. The quality of service of the department of the city residents was 2.99 points out of three.
